result.arabic_text: قَالَتۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ إِنِّيٓ أُلۡقِيَ إِلَيَّ كِتَٰبٞ كَرِيمٌ
result.translation: 29.Hud-Hud Nabii Suleymaan kaal ruube kitab luk gexeeh sabah amoytal kaa qambiseeh kaa tikriyeh, tohuk lakal kee makaabaney:diggah Massakaxxa -Íe kitab yol qambisimeeh yoo gufe keenik itte.
